name: Warlock
ability: Each night*: choose a player. If a dead character with an ability is chosen, they lose their ability for the rest of the game.

name: Gravekeeper
ability: Each night: choose a player; if they are dead, you learn their character. If not, you learn a character they are not.

name: Guardian
ability: Each night: choose a player; they are unaffected by effects from dead characters tonight.

name: Mother
ability: You learn how many outsiders are sitting next to evil players.

name: Inspector
ability: Each night: choose a player; you learn that they are one of 3 characters.

name: Mortician
ability: Each night*: choose a player; if they died last night, you learn their character.

name: Benevolent Spirit
ability: Each night*: choose a player other than yourself; they are safe from the Demon tonight. You register as dead.

name: Ravenkeeper
ability: If you die at night: choose a player; you learn their character.

name: Watcher
ability: Each night: choose 2 players; you learn if either of them chose other players, but not how many or who.

name: Trapper
ability: Once per game, at night: choose a player other than yourself. If a player chooses this player during the night, you learn their character.

name: Vampire Hunter
ability: Each night: choose 2 players; you learn if any are evil, but not how many.

name: Priest
ability: Once per game, at night: choose a player other than yourself; they cannot suffer negative effects tonight.

name: Terrified Child
ability: If a dead player chooses you during the night, you learn who they are.
